divs: Sighting Detailsi just woke up in my apartament in belo horizonte and filmed the sky trying to capture the "rod" phenomenon, but when i watched the recording, i noticed a white sphere in the sky. i haven't saw anything with naked eye. there was nothing in the sky. no planes, baloons or helicopters
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Belo Horizonte
There were no other sightings in Belo Horizonte on or around December 21st 2010
